snippet.title: Half-Life: Someplace Else (Full Mod, No Commentary)
snippet.description:
"I liked it. Did you know this was made by the same guy who made the Minerva mod for Half-Life 2? Sure felt like it.

I'll admit, I got lost a few times. But I managed to get to the end.

Still don't know why the text guy is so heated with me. 'You weren't sneaky so now everyone knows you're here.' OH I'm sorry! I'll just sneak around this guy who is NOT ONLY FACING ME but is also blocking my path, thus removing my ability to be sneaky.

Anyway, those are my only complaints I have for the mod. The good outweighs the bad so there's that."

Get it: https://www.runthinkshootlive.com/posts/someplace-else/

=================

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/jeriahtheforestlizard/
